column1:
Overall, the percentage of negative sentiment for the various aspects of the hotel over the years has been increasing. Cleaniness, Services, Location, General, and Value have all been witnessing an increase in negative sentiment over the years, with Cleaniness showing the most improvement with a 19.04% negative sentiment rate in 2019.

To improve on these aspects, the hotel should look into offering higher quality services such as better amenities, improved room cleaning services, and improved locations and access to local attractions. Additionally, the hotel should focus on improving customer support services to address any complaints or inquiries in a timely manner. Furthermore, the hotel should focus on offering value and excellent deals to customers to ensure they keep them satisfied. Finally, the hotel should focus on creating a better overall experience for customers to make them feel more welcome and at home.
